com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production

Interface DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory<TProductionEndPoint extends ProductionEndPoint>

  • Type Parameters:
    TProductionEndPoint - The type of the production endpoint this factory will be building senders for.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryDatumEnvelopeSenderFactory, KafkaDatumEnvelopeSenderFactory, LogFileDatumEnvelopeSenderFactory

    public interface DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory<TProductionEndPoint extends ProductionEndPoint>
    A base interface for classes to extend in order to build a custom Sender, for a custom ProductionEndPoint.
